Package net.sf.image4j.io

Provides special classes for working with I/O, such as endian conversions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CountingDataInput  
    CountingInput  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountingDataInputStream  
    CountingInputStream  
    EndianUtils
    Provides utility methods for endian conversions [big-endian to little-endian; little-endian to big-endian].
    IOUtils  
    LittleEndianInputStream
    Reads little-endian data from a source InputStream by reversing byte ordering.
    LittleEndianOutputStream
    Writes little-endian data to a target OutputStream by reversing byte ordering.
    LittleEndianRandomAccessFile
    Provides endian conversions for input and output with a RandomAccessFile.

Package net.sf.image4j.io Description

Provides special classes for working with I/O, such as endian conversions. Java uses big-endian byte ordering, while some formats use little-endian byte ordering. Thus it is necessary to perform endian conversions when encoding and decoding data in these formats.
